1.0.name: wordpress/nofollow-tags-for-movies-sites
1.0.description:
Nofollow Tags For Movies Sites adds the nofollow tag to all of your outgoing links to video hosting websites. Perfect if you're running a Video / Movies / Tv / Anime blog.

Below is the primary list of sites written in to the plugin that will have the nofollow tag already attached.

4shared.com 56.com beta.miloyski.com bigupload.com blinkx.com blip.tv bolt.com boltfolio.com clipshack.com cruncyroll.com dailymotion.com divxden.com divxstage.net divxvine.com filebase.to freestreamtube.com gougou.com graboid.com infinitemb.com ku6.cn megashare.com megashares.com megaupload.com megavideo.com metacafe.com motionbox.com movshare.net myspace.com mystream.to novamov.com ouou.com rapidshare.com revver.com stagevu.com supernovatube.com stream2k.com streamleech.com themoviedownloads.com todou.com truveo.com veoh.com upzilla.net vhead.blog.sina.com.cn video44.com videoegg.com vimeo.com wartog.info wisevid.com xtshare.com youko.com youtube.com zangocash.com zhare.net
